onboardata.title1: SMARTKIDS is the first app that lists the best places, events, restaurants, hotels, and Kids-Friendly services near you and beyond!
onboardata.title2: SMARTKIDS also helps you in choosing the educational path for your children by selecting the best schools and daycares.
onboardata.title3: With intuitive navigation tailored for busy parents, SMARTKIDS will become the essential app in your daily life.

informations_de_connexion: Please enter your login details to access your account.
adresse_email_associee: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we’ll send you a password reset code.
confirme_code_texte: Please enter the verification code sent to your email to ensure the security of your account.
saisir_le_code: Please enter the verification code sent to your email
assurer_securite: to ensure the security of your account.
creez_un_nouveau_mot_de_passe: Create a new password: Enhance the security of your account by choosing a strong, memorable passcode.
register_politique: By clicking 'Sign up,' you agree to Smart Kids' Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
utilisez_ce_code: Use this code to get a discount
methodes_de_paiement_text: Security and simplicity: Choose from our easy payment methods. Pay confidently with our range of secure and convenient options for smooth and secure transactions.
mot_de_passe_mis_a_jour: Password updated. You can now log in.
abonnez_vous: Subscribe to make your establishment visible
vouloir_annuler_votre_abonnement: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
abonnement_annule_avec_succes: Your subscription has been successfully canceled.
votre_abonnement_sera_annule: Your subscription will be canceled at the end of the current period
presentation_description: Briefly describe your establishment, its history, and what makes it unique. Share your values and vision.
information_description: Provide general information about your establishment, such as the type of services you offer, opening hours, and main contact methods.
services_description: Highlight specific services or features that make your establishment unique. This may include details on facilities, special offers, or additional services.
laquelle_de_ces_propositions: Which of these options best describes your establishment?
categorie_d_age_convient: For which age category is your establishment suitable?
entrez_le_nom_ou_rs: Enter the name or company name of your establishment
code_promo_description: Users can use this code to get a discount
service_et_horaires: What are your services and opening hours?
ajouter_quelques_images: Add some images of your establishment
avis_envoyé: Your review has been successfully sent
une_erreur_est_survenue: An error occurred while connecting to the server

profil.share_app: Share the app with a friend

text_suppression: We want to inform you that deleting your SmartKids account is an irreversible action. This operation will permanently erase all personal data associated with your account, including your preferences, history, and profile information.
profil_text_se_connecter: Add establishments to favorites, leave your opinion and add your establishment by accessing your account
